document.discussion_title: Jeweler Sues Insurer Over Diamonds Tossed in Garbage
document.topic_text: Jeweler Sues Insurer Over Diamonds Tossed in Garbage It doesn’t matter if we agree or disagree about whether it should be covered, if the policy was supposed to cover that, and didn’t, that’s the issue. Link:
